reviews.review_msg: great prof -- super funny & interesting. cares a lot about social causes and often tries to make class relevant to things that are actually happening in the world.

Dr. Burnham is the most disrespectful person I have ever had the displeasure of meeting. His expectations for the 200-level are astronomically high and he does not provide any constructive feedback; rather, his feedback is destructive and belittling. He takes special efforts to make women feel small and insignificant. Avoid him at all costs...
